entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as smiling tremulously and muttering to herself, indicating she is emotional and possibly upset.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as not thinking Mrs. Weasley silly, showing he has a different opinion of her than others do.

entities.name: boggart
entities.description: The boggart is described as posing as the corpse of each member of Mrs. Weasley's family in turn, indicating it can take on various forms.

relationships.description: Harry has an opinion about Mrs. Weasley, not thinking her silly.
The boggart poses as the corpse of each member of Mrs. Weasley's family in turn.
